MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Util.Formatter Format (string format, params Java.Lang.Object[] args);
.method public hidebysig instance class Java.Util.Formatter Format(string format, class Java.Lang.Object[] args) cil managed

Docs.param: A format string as described in Format string syntax.

Arguments referenced by the format specifiers in the format string. If there are more arguments than format specifiers, the extra arguments are ignored. The maximum number of arguments is limited by the maximum dimension of a Java array as defined by <cite>The Java™ Virtual Machine Specification</cite>.
Docs.summary: Writes a formatted string to this object's destination using the specified format string and arguments.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: A format string as described in Format string syntax.

Arguments referenced by the format specifiers in the format string. If there are more arguments than format specifiers, the extra arguments are ignored. The maximum number of arguments is limited by the maximum dimension of a Java array as defined by <cite>The Java™ Virtual Machine Specification</cite>.
